events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund for the purchase. Please advise on the next steps.
Issue categorized as Refund based on customer's request for money back due to receiving incorrect product.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request for the incorrect order item.
Hello! I'm Sarah from support. Sorry to hear about the issue. I'll help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide a photo of the received incorrect item and your order number so we can proceed?
I have attached the photo showing the incorrect product and here is my order number: 123456789.
Thank you for the details. We will process a full refund to your original payment method within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate the help and look forward to the refund confirmation.
The refund request is now processed. You will receive a confirmation email shortly when the funds are returned.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund and if everything is satisfactory with your case.
Since no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
A short survey has been sent to your email to gather feedback on your customer support experience.
